Flow.description: Tasks to automatically be created when the stage is won.

value.stringValue: "Wire should be coming in for $" + TEXT([Opportunity].Pro_Forma_Price_Sent__c) + ". Once received, move opp to delivering (if we are doing freight) or closed won stage"

formulas.name: formula_4_myRule_1_A1_3027636720
formulas.expression: "Wire should be coming in for $" + TEXT({!myVariable_current.Pro_Forma_Price_Sent__c}) + ". Once received, move opp to delivering (if we are doing freight) or closed won stage"

Flow.label: After an opportunity is won

value.stringValue: Opp lost, let seller know no deal, or let the unit owner know to inform the seller.

recordCreates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordCreates.label: Watch for wire in, move opp to closed/won or delivering stage

value.stringValue: Send Paid Invoice to buyer, copy opp owner; begin freight process if needed
Record sale in QBO and upload wire/invoice file to Unit
Update Opp GP to reflect correct GP amount
Post a picture of this unit on a truck, or a picture of it with a "SOLD" stamp on it, to Zadoon's FB AND LinkedIn Pages. Create tasks for CM and HB to post on their FB/LinkedIn pages.
Won opp follow-up & review request. If good review, task Sales Admin to post positive review on FB/Social Media.

recordUpdates.name: myRule_6_A8
recordUpdates.label: Update Final Sale Price on Opp
